pr_title: Don't generate docs when "quickly" sys prop is set to true

timeline.author: Sanne

replies.bodyText: Currently skipping the documentation generation is opt-in, so we don't want to skip by default
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: yes, sure I got confused by the API :)
replies.author: Sanne
